text: The Eighth Day of the Week () is a 1958 Polish German drama movie directed by Aleksander Ford and starring Sonja Ziemann, Zbigniew Cybulski, Jan Świderski, Barbara Połomska, Ilse Steppat. == Other websites == * Category:1958 drama movies Category:Polish drama movies Category:German drama movies Category:Movies directed by Aleksander Ford
title: The Eighth Day of the Week
